{"step_by_step_thinking": "The relevant document that mentions vulcanization is 'Vulcanism, mercury-sensitized photo-reactions and abiogenetic synthesis: a theoretical treatment.' The energy levels of 6(1) P1 and 6(3) P1 resonance states and the high vapor pressure of the metal at temperatures as low as 293 K bring Hg within the range of bond dissociation energies in most organic molecules and many inorganics.
